<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#F5F5F5">
<!-- Header --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/headerSection" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="20dp" android:background="#FFFFFF">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Lịch sử bảo dưỡng" android:textSize="24sp" android:textColor="#1E293B" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Xem các cuộc hẹn của bạn" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#64748B" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Appointments List --> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_below="@id/headerSection" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Appointments Container --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/llAppointmentsContainer" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" />
<!-- Empty State --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/emptyState" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="40dp" android:visibility="gone">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="" android:textSize="64sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Chưa có lịch hẹn nào" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="#64748B" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Đặt lịch bảo dưỡng để bắt đầu" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#94A3B8" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>
<!-- Loading Overlay --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/loadingOverlay" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#80000000" android:clickable="true" android:visibility="gone">
<ProgressBar android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:indeterminateTint="#FFFFFF" /> </FrameLayout> </RelativeLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Vehicle Name Title --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvVehicleName" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Tesla Model 3" android:textSize="28sp" android:textColor="#1A1A1A" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:paddingTop="24dp" android:paddingBottom="24dp" android:background="#FFFFFF" />
<!-- Vehicle Image with Rounded Corners --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="280dp" android:layout_marginStart="20dp" android:layout_marginEnd="20dp" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" app:cardCornerRadius="20dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/ivVehicleImage" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_menu_gallery" android:contentDescription="@string/car_image" />
<!-- Loading indicator for image --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/imageProgressBar" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:visibility="gone" /> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Information Grid (2 columns) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="32dp" android:paddingEnd="32dp" android:paddingBottom="24dp">
<!-- Row 1: Model and Year --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp">
<!-- Model --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Model" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#999999" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvModel" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Model 3" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="#1A1A1A" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Year --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Year" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#999999" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvYear" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="2021" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="#1A1A1A" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Row 2: VIN and Mileage --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp">
<!-- VIN --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="VIN" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#999999" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvVin" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="1HGBH41JXMN109186" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="#1A1A1A" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Mileage --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Mileage" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#999999" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvMileage" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="0" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="#1A1A1A" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Row 3: Price and Owner --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp">
<!-- Price --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Price" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#999999" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvPrice" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="50.000 đ" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="#1A1A1A" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Owner --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Owner" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#999999" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvOwner" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Khách VIP" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="#1A1A1A" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Row 4: Address (full width) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Address" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#999999" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvAddress" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Vietnam" android:textSize="18sp" android:textColor="#1A1A1A" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Book Service Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/btnBookService" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_marginStart="32dp" android:layout_marginEnd="32dp" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" android:text="@string/book_service" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:textStyle="bold" android:background="@drawable/button_rounded" android:backgroundTint="#4A90E2" android:elevation="0dp" />
<!-- Loading Indicator --> <ProgressBar android:id="@+id/progressBar" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_margin="32dp" android:visibility="gone" />
<!-- Error Message --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tvError" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center" android:layout_margin="32dp" android:text="Failed to load vehicle details" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="#FF6B6B" android:visibility="gone" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#FFFFFF">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Header with Status --> <RelativeLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvAppointmentDate" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="12/12/2024" android:textSize="16sp" android:textColor="#1E293B" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_alignParentStart="true" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvStatus" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Pending" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="#FFFFFF" android:background="@drawable/status_badge" android:paddingStart="12dp" android:paddingEnd="12dp" android:paddingTop="4dp" android:paddingBottom="4dp" android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" /> </RelativeLayout>
<!-- Divider --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#E2E8F0" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<!-- Vehicle Info --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text=" Xe:" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#64748B" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvVehicleInfo" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="2" android:text="Honda City - 29A-12345" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#1E293B" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Center Info --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text=" Trung tâm:" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#64748B" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tvCenterInfo" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="2" android:text="EV Center" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="#1E293B" android:gravity="end" /> </LinearLayout>
